short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to send messages on WhatsApp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kermeet is an application that allows you to send messages directly from your computer to WhatsApp contacts without the need to add them to your phone's contact list. This application is particularly useful for sales professionals.
